0.text: 1. Adverbs are mainly formed by adding –ly to the adjectives.
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. <break time='200ms'/> Adverbs <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> mainly <break time='200ms'/> formed <break time='200ms'/> by <break time='200ms'/> adding <break time='200ms'/> –ly <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> adjectives. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

1.text: Adjective Adverb slow slowly high highly quick quickly unexpected unexpectedly sad sadly kind kindly neat neatly beautiful beautifully careful carefully safe safely warm warmly
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Adjective <break time='200ms'/> Adverb <break time='200ms'/> slow <break time='200ms'/> slowly <break time='200ms'/> high <break time='200ms'/> highly <break time='200ms'/> quick <break time='200ms'/> quickly <break time='200ms'/> unexpected <break time='200ms'/> unexpectedly <break time='200ms'/> sad <break time='200ms'/> sadly <break time='200ms'/> kind <break time='200ms'/> kindly <break time='200ms'/> neat <break time='200ms'/> neatly <break time='200ms'/> beautiful <break time='200ms'/> beautifully <break time='200ms'/> careful <break time='200ms'/> carefully <break time='200ms'/> safe <break time='200ms'/> safely <break time='200ms'/> warm <break time='200ms'/> warmly <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.text: e.g. :- Raj is a kind person. (adjective) He spoke kindly. (adverb) It was a safe journey. (adjective) They reached Jaffna safely. (adverb)
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>e.g. <break time='200ms'/> :- <break time='200ms'/> Raj <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> kind <break time='200ms'/> person. <break time='200ms'/> (adjective) <break time='200ms'/> He <break time='200ms'/> spoke <break time='200ms'/> kindly. <break time='200ms'/> (adverb) <break time='200ms'/> It <break time='200ms'/> was <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> safe <break time='200ms'/> journey. <break time='200ms'/> (adjective) <break time='200ms'/> They <break time='200ms'/> reached <break time='200ms'/> Jaffna <break time='200ms'/> safely. <break time='200ms'/> (adverb) <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: 2. Adverbs that are also used as adjectives.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>2. <break time='200ms'/> Adverbs <break time='200ms'/> that <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> also <break time='200ms'/> used <break time='200ms'/> as <break time='200ms'/> adjectives. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

4.text: Adjective Adverb hard hard fast fast early early
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Adjective <break time='200ms'/> Adverb <break time='200ms'/> hard <break time='200ms'/> hard <break time='200ms'/> fast <break time='200ms'/> fast <break time='200ms'/> early <break time='200ms'/> early <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.text: e.g. :- It was a fast train. (adjective) The train went fast. (adverb)
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>e.g. <break time='200ms'/> :- <break time='200ms'/> It <break time='200ms'/> was <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> fast <break time='200ms'/> train. <break time='200ms'/> (adjective) <break time='200ms'/> The <break time='200ms'/> train <break time='200ms'/> went <break time='200ms'/> fast. <break time='200ms'/> (adverb) <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

6.text: 3. 'Well' is the adverb of the adjective 'good'.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>3. <break time='200ms'/> 'Well' <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> adverb <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> adjective <break time='200ms'/> 'good'. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Adjective <break time='200ms'/> Adverb <break time='200ms'/> good <break time='200ms'/> well <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.text: e.g. :- He is a good student. (adjective) He studies well. (adverb )
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>e.g. <break time='200ms'/> :- <break time='200ms'/> He <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> good <break time='200ms'/> student. <break time='200ms'/> (adjective) <break time='200ms'/> He <break time='200ms'/> studies <break time='200ms'/> well. <break time='200ms'/> (adverb <break time='200ms'/> ) <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
